scripts.analytics: tsx -e "import {LearningSytem} from './src/lib/ai/learning-system'; const ls = new LearningSytem(); ls.getDailySummary().then(console.log)"
scripts.learning:cycle: tsx -e "import {LearningSytem} from './src/lib/ai/learning-system'; const ls = new LearningSytem(); ls.learningEngine.performLearningCycle().then(() => console.log('Learning cycle completed'))"
